div.head: 搐掣
div.div: jerking of hands and feet; convulsions

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: jerking of hands and feet; convulsions

sense.def: Illness Sign identical with chou che 抽掣 , convulsions. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 21: 治破傷風，身體拘 急，手足搐掣，牙關急強，宜服羌活散方 , “To cure wound wind, with the entire body cramping and being tense, jerking of hands and feet , and clenched jaw, the recipe to ingest the powder with qiang huo is advisable”.
